languages.text: "Хитрый паук этот Калькасар. Явно замыслил какое-то тайное дело, в коем мы послужим ему орудием. Коварен, словно ксенос!"
"That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"
languages.original_text: "Хитрый паук этот Калькасар. Явно замыслил какое-то тайное дело, в коем мы послужим ему орудием. Коварен, словно ксенос!"

traits.locale_text: "That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"
"That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"
"That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"
"That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"

languages.text: “卡尔卡扎，那只狡猾的蜘蛛！很显然，他在策划什么阴谋诡计，打算把我们当成他的工具。那家伙狡诈得就像只异形！”
languages.original_text: "That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"

traits.locale_text: “卡尔卡扎，那只狡猾的蜘蛛！很显然，他在策划什么阴谋诡计，打算把我们当成他的工具。那家伙狡诈得就像只异形！”

languages.text: « Quelle araignée sournoise, ce Calcazar... Il mijote quelque chose, ça ne fait aucun doute, et il a visiblement l'intention de se servir de nous pour parvenir à ses fins. Malin comme un xénos, celui-là ! »
languages.original_text: "That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"

traits.locale_text: « Quelle araignée sournoise, ce Calcazar... Il mijote quelque chose, ça ne fait aucun doute, et il a visiblement l'intention de se servir de nous pour parvenir à ses fins. Malin comme un xénos, celui-là ! »

languages.text: «Esa araña de Calcazar es muy astuta. Claramente trama algo en secreto y tiene intención de usarnos como herramientas. ¡Un plan taimado como un xenos!».
languages.original_text: "That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"

traits.locale_text: «Esa araña de Calcazar es muy astuta. Claramente trama algo en secreto y tiene intención de usarnos como herramientas. ¡Un plan taimado como un xenos!».

languages.text: 「あの狡猾グモのカルカサルか。奴が秘密の陰謀を何件か企てていたのは明らかだ。俺たちを道具にするつもりだ。異種族並にずる賢い奴め！」
languages.original_text: "That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの狡猾グモのカルカサルか。奴が秘密の陰謀を何件か企てていたのは明らかだ。俺たちを道具にするつもりだ。異種族並にずる賢い奴め！」

languages.text: "Diese gerissene Spinne Calcazar. Er schmiedet offenbar einen geheimen Plan, und er will uns als seine Werkzeuge nutzen. Heimtückisch wie ein Xenos!"
languages.original_text: "That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"

traits.locale_text: "Diese gerissene Spinne Calcazar. Er schmiedet offenbar einen geheimen Plan, und er will uns als seine Werkzeuge nutzen. Heimtückisch wie ein Xenos!"

languages.original_text: "That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"

languages.text: "O sinsi Calcazar yok mu... Kesin gizli bir kumpas kuruyor, bizi de araç olarak kullanmayı planlıyor. Zeno gibi kurnaz!"
languages.original_text: "That sly spider Calcazar. He is obviously hatching some secret plot and he is planning to use us as his tools. Cunning as a xenos!"

traits.locale_text: "O sinsi Calcazar yok mu... Kesin gizli bir kumpas kuruyor ve bizi de araç olarak kullanmayı planlıyor. Zeno gibi kurnaz!"
